typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Id as string,
		IsDeleted as boolean,
		ServiceAppointmentId as string,
		CreatedById as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		Field as string,
		OldValue as string,
		NewValue as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> DLSAHistory
DLSAHistory alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterUpsert
AlterUpsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Id','CreatedDate'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> ODSSAHistory

source(output(
		ID as integer,
		Date as timestamp,
		CenterID as integer,
		ClientGUID as string,
		ClientMembershipGUID as string,
		SalesOrderGUID as string,
		HairSystemOrderGUID as string,
		MethodName as string,
		UserName as string,
		Thread as string,
		Level as string,
		Logger as string,
		Message as string,
		Exception as string,
		HostName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> DLLogs
DLLogs alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterUpsert
AlterUpsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ID','Date'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> ODSLogs

	),

	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> ODSOpportunityHistory

source(output(

AlterUpsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,

properties.description: Load the necessary columns from ODS.CNCT_cfgMembership to DimMembership dimension.

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	DaysToLoad as integer
}
source(output(
		MembershipID as integer,
		MembershipSortOrder as integer,
		MembershipDescription as string,
		MembershipDescriptionShort as string,
		BusinessSegmentID as integer,
		RevenueGroupID as integer,
		GenderID as integer,
		DurationMonths as integer,
		ContractPrice as decimal(19,4),
		MonthlyFee as decimal(19,4),
		IsTaxableFlag as boolean,
		IsDefaultMembershipFlag as boolean,
		IsActiveFlag as boolean,
		CreateDate as timestamp,
		CreateUser as string,
		LastUpdate as timestamp,
		LastUpdateUser as string,
		UpdateStamp as binary,
		IsHairSystemOrderRushFlag as boolean,
		HairSystemGeneralLedgerID as integer,
		DefaultPaymentSalesCodeID as integer,
		NumRenewalDays as integer,
		NumDaysAfterCancelBeforeNew as integer,
		CanCheckinForConsultation as boolean,
		MaximumHairSystemHairLengthValue as integer,
		ExpectedConversionDays as integer,
		MinimumAge as integer,
		MaximumAge as integer,
		MaximumLongHairAddOnHairLengthValue as integer,
		BOSSalesTypeCode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> ODSMembership
source(output(
		GenderKey as integer,
		GenderId as integer,
		GenderName as string,
		Hash as string,
		DWH_LoadDate as timestamp,
		DWH_LastUpdateDate as timestamp,
		IsActive as boolean,
		SourceSystem as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> DimGender
source(output(
		BusinessSegmentID as integer,
		BusinessSegmentSortOrder as integer,
		BusinessSegmentDescription as string,
		BusinessSegmentDescriptionShort as string,
		IsActiveFlag as boolean,
		CreateDate as timestamp,
		CreateUser as string,
		LastUpdate as timestamp,
		LastUpdateUser as string,
		UpdateStamp as binary
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> ODSBusinessSegment
source(output(
		RevenueGroupID as integer,
		RevenueGroupSortOrder as integer,
		RevenueGroupDescription as string,
		RevenueGroupDescriptionShort as string,
		IsActiveFlag as boolean,
		CreateDate as timestamp,
		CreateUser as string,
		LastUpdate as timestamp,
		LastUpdateUser as string,
		UpdateStamp as binary
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> ODSRevenueGroup
ODSMembership filter(toDate(LastUpdate) >= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), ($DaysToLoad * -1)) && toDate(LastUpdate) <= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), -1) && !isNull(MembershipID)) ~> LastUpdateAndMembershipIDFilter
LastUpdateAndMembershipIDFilter select(mapColumn(
		MembershipID,
		MembershipName = MembershipDescription,
		MembershipShortName = MembershipDescriptionShort,
		BusinessSegmentID,
		RevenueGroupID,
		GenderID,
		DurationMonths,
		ContractPrice,
		MonthlyFee,
		IsTaxableFlag,
		IsDefaultMembershipFlag,
		IsActiveFlag,
		MembershipCreateDate = CreateDate,
		MembershipLastUpdateDate = LastUpdate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns derive(SourceSystem = 'Conect',
		DWH_CreatedDate = currentTimestamp(),
		DWH_LastUpdateDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> AddSourceSystem
SelectColumnsM alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> Upsert
AddSourceSystem, SelectGenderKey join(SelectColumns@GenderID == SelectGenderKey@GenderId,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDimGender
JoinRevenueGroup derive(MembershipID = MembershipID,
		MembershipName = initCap(MembershipName),
		MembershipShortName = upper(MembershipShortName),
		BusinessSegmentKey = -1,
		BusinessSegmentID = SelectColumns@BusinessSegmentID,
		RevenueGroupKey = -1,
		RevenueGroupID = SelectColumns@RevenueGroupID,
		GenderKey = coalesce(GenderKey, -1),
		GenderID = SelectColumns@GenderID,
		DurationMonths = DurationMonths,
		ContractPrice = ContractPrice,
		MonthlyFee = MonthlyFee,
		IsTaxableFlag = IsTaxableFlag,
		IsDefaultMembershipFlag = IsDefaultMembershipFlag,
		IsActive = IsActiveFlag,
		SourceSystem = 'Conect',
		BusinessSegmentName = initCap(BusinessSegmentName),
		BusinessSegmentNameShort = upper(BusinessSegmentShortName),
		RevenueGroupName = RevenueGroupName,
		RevenueGroupNameShort = upper(RevenueGroupShortName),
		MembershipCreateDate = MembershipCreateDate,
		MembershipLastUpdateDate = MembershipLastUpdateDate) ~> FinalColumns
FinalColumns select(mapColumn(
		each(match(stream=='FinalColumns'))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumnsM
GenderGroupFilter select(mapColumn(
		GenderKey,
		GenderId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectGenderKey
DimGender filter(lower(trim(SourceSystem)) == 'conect') ~> GenderGroupFilter
ODSBusinessSegment select(mapColumn(
		BusinessSegmentID,
		BusinessSegmentName = BusinessSegmentDescription,
		BusinessSegmentShortName = BusinessSegmentDescriptionShort
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectBusinesSegmentId
ODSRevenueGroup select(mapColumn(
		RevenueGroupID,
		RevenueGroupName = RevenueGroupDescription,
		RevenueGroupShortName = RevenueGroupDescriptionShort
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRevenueGroupId
JoinDimGender, SelectBusinesSegmentId join(SelectColumns@BusinessSegmentID == SelectBusinesSegmentId@BusinessSegmentID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinBusinessSegment
JoinBusinessSegment, SelectRevenueGroupId join(SelectColumns@RevenueGroupID == SelectRevenueGroupId@RevenueGroupID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinRevenueGroup
Upsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		MembershipKey as integer,
		MembershipID as integer,
		MembershipName as string,
		MembershipShortName as string,
		BusinessSegmentKey as integer,
		BusinessSegmentID as integer,
		RevenueGroupKey as integer,
		RevenueGroupID as integer,
		GenderKey as integer,
		GenderID as string,
		DurationMonths as integer,
		ContractPrice as decimal(18,0),
		MonthlyFee as decimal(18,0),
		IsTaxableFlag as boolean,
		IsDefaultMembershipFlag as boolean,
		IsActive as boolean,
		DWH_CreatedDate as timestamp,
		DWH_LastUpdateDate as timestamp,
		SourceSystem as string,
		BusinessSegmentName as string,
		BusinessSegmentShortName as string,
		RevenueGroupName as string,
		RevenueGroupShortName as string,
		MembershipCreateDate as timestamp,
		MembershipLastUpdateDate as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['MembershipID'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		MembershipID,
		MembershipName,
		MembershipShortName,
		BusinessSegmentKey,
		BusinessSegmentID,
		RevenueGroupKey,
		RevenueGroupID,
		GenderKey,
		GenderID,
		DurationMonths,
		ContractPrice,
		MonthlyFee,
		IsTaxableFlag,
		IsDefaultMembershipFlag,
		IsActive = IsActiveFlag,
		DWH_LastUpdateDate,
		SourceSystem,
		BusinessSegmentName,
		BusinessSegmentShortName,
		RevenueGroupName,
		RevenueGroupShortName,
		MembershipCreateDate,
		MembershipLastUpdateDate,
		DWH_CreatedDate
	)) ~> UpdateDimMember

source(output(
		FactDate as timestamp,
		FactDatekey as integer,
		OpportunityId as string,
		LeadKey as integer,
		LeadId as string,
		AccountKey as integer,
		AccountId as string,
		OpportunityName as string,

		StatusKey as integer,

		CampaignKey as integer,
		OpportunityCampaign as string,
		CloseDate as timestamp,
		CloseDateKey as integer,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		CreatedUserKey as integer,
		CreatedById as string,
		LastModifiedDate as timestamp,
		UpdateUserKey as integer,
		LastModifiedById as string,
		LossReasonKey as integer,
		OpportunityLossReason as string,
		IsDeleted as boolean,
		IsClosed as boolean,
		IsWon as boolean,

		OpportunitySolutionOffered as string,
		ExternalTaskId as string,
		BeBackFlag as boolean,
		CenterKey as integer,
		CenterNumber as integer,
		IsOld as integer,
		Ammount as decimal(38,18)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> Factopportunity
Factopportunity filter(toDate(FactDate)<= toDate('2021-07-31')) ~> FilterByFactDate
FilterByFactDate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		FactDate as timestamp,
		FactDatekey as integer,
		OpportunityId as string,
		LeadKey as integer,

		AccountKey as integer,

		LossReasonKey as integer,

		IsDeleted as boolean,
		IsClosed as boolean,
		IsWon as boolean,
		OpportunityReferralCode as string,
		OpportunitySourceCode as string,
		OpportunitySolutionOffered as string,
		ExternalTaskId as string,
		BeBackFlag as boolean,
		CenterKey as integer,
		CenterNumber as integer,
		IsOld as integer,
		Ammount as decimal(38,18)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> InsertFactOpportunityTRacking

properties.description: This DF is to insert a previous month snapshot into FactAppointmentTracking from FactAppointment

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		FactDate as timestamp,
		FactTimeKey as integer,
		FactDateKey as integer,
		AppointmentDate as timestamp,
		AppointmentTimeKey as integer,
		AppointmentDateKey as integer,
		LeadKey as integer,
		LeadId as string,
		AccountKey as integer,
		AccountId as string,
		ContactKey as integer,
		ContactId as string,
		ParentRecordType as string,
		WorkTypeKey as integer,
		WorkTypeId as string,
		AccountAddress as string,
		AccountCity as string,
		AccountState as string,
		AccountPostalCode as string,
		AccountCountry as string,
		GeographyKey as integer,
		AppointmentDescription as string,
		AppointmentStatus as string,
		CenterKey as integer,
		ServiceTerritoryId as string,
		CenterNumber as integer,
		AppointmentTypeKey as integer,
		AppointmentType as string,
		AppointmentCenterType as string,
		ExternalId as string,
		ServiceAppointment as string,
		MeetingPlatformKey as integer,
		MeetingPlatformId as string,
		MeetingPlatform as string,
		DWH_LoadDate as timestamp,
		DWH_LastUpdateDate as timestamp,
		ParentRecordId as string,
		AppointmentId as string,
		ExternalTaskId as string,
		StatusKey as integer,
		CancellationReason as string,
		BeBackFlag as boolean,
		OldStatus as string,
		AppoinmentStatusCategory as string,
		IsDeleted as boolean,
		IsOld as integer,
		OpportunityId as string,
		OpportunityStatus as string,
		OpportunityDate as timestamp,
		OpportunityReferralCode as string,
		OpportunityReferralCodeExpirationDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> FactAppointment
FactAppointment filter(month(toDate(AppointmentDate)) == month(toDate(addMonths(currentTimestamp(),-1))) && year(toDate(AppointmentDate)) == year(toDate(addMonths(currentTimestamp(),-1)))) ~> FilterbyAppointmentDate
FilterbyAppointmentDate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		FactDate as timestamp,
		FactTimeKey as integer,
		FactDateKey as integer,
		AppointmentDate as timestamp,
		AppointmentTimeKey as integer,
		AppointmentDateKey as integer,
		LeadKey as integer,
		LeadId as string,
		AccountKey as integer,
		AccountId as string,
		ContactKey as integer,
		ContactId as string,
		ParentRecordType as string,
		WorkTypeKey as integer,
		WorkTypeId as string,
		AccountAddress as string,
		AccountCity as string,
		AccountState as string,
		AccountPostalCode as string,
		AccountCountry as string,
		GeographyKey as integer,
		AppointmentDescription as string,
		AppointmentStatus as string,
		CenterKey as integer,
		ServiceTerritoryId as string,
		CenterNumber as integer,
		AppointmentTypeKey as integer,
		AppointmentType as string,
		AppointmentCenterType as string,
		ExternalId as string,
		ServiceAppointment as string,
		MeetingPlatformKey as integer,
		MeetingPlatformId as string,
		MeetingPlatform as string,
		DWH_LoadDate as timestamp,
		DWH_LastUpdateDate as timestamp,
		ParentRecordId as string,
		AppointmentId as string,
		ExternalTaskId as string,
		StatusKey as integer,
		CancellationReason as string,
		BeBackFlag as boolean,
		OldStatus as string,
		AppoinmentStatusCategory as string,
		IsDeleted as boolean,
		IsOld as integer,
		OpportunityId as string,
		OpportunityStatus as string,
		OpportunityDate as timestamp,
		OpportunityReferralCode as string,
		OpportunityReferralCodeExpirationDate as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		FactDate,
		FactTimeKey,
		FactDateKey,
		AppointmentDate,
		AppointmentTimeKey,
		AppointmentDateKey,
		LeadKey,
		LeadId,
		AccountKey,
		AccountId,
		ContactKey,
		ContactId,
		ParentRecordType,
		WorkTypeKey,
		WorkTypeId,
		AccountAddress,
		AccountCity,
		AccountState,
		AccountPostalCode,
		AccountCountry,
		GeographyKey,
		AppointmentDescription,
		AppointmentStatus,
		CenterKey,
		ServiceTerritoryId,
		CenterNumber,
		AppointmentTypeKey,
		AppointmentType,
		AppointmentCenterType,
		ExternalId,
		ServiceAppointment,
		MeetingPlatformKey,
		MeetingPlatformId,
		MeetingPlatform,
		DWH_LoadDate,
		DWH_LastUpdateDate,
		ParentRecordId,
		AppointmentId,
		ExternalTaskId,
		StatusKey,
		CancellationReason,
		BeBackFlag,
		OldStatus,
		AppoinmentStatusCategory,
		IsDeleted,
		IsOld,
		OpportunityId,
		OpportunityStatus,
		OpportunityDate,
		OpportunityReferralCode,
		OpportunityReferralCodeExpirationDate
	)) ~> InsertFactAppointmentTracking

source(output(
		AppointmentDetailGUID as string,
		AppointmentGUID as string,
		SalesCodeID as integer,
		AppointmentDetailDuration as integer,
		CreateDate as timestamp,
		CreateUser as string,
		LastUpdate as timestamp,
		LastUpdateUser as string,
		UpdateStamp as binary,
		Quantity as integer,
		Price as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> DatAppointmentDetail
DatAppointmentDetail alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AllowUpsert
AllowUpsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		AppointmentDetailGUID as string,
		AppointmentGUID as string,
		SalesCodeID as integer,
		AppointmentDetailDuration as integer,
		CreateDate as timestamp,
		CreateUser as string,
		LastUpdate as timestamp,
		LastUpdateUser as string,
		Quantity as integer,
